result.title: division by zero
result.content: Today I found a very interesting fact. int gcc, If you write cout << 5/0 << endl; it will cause a division by zero exception and get RTE. if you write cout << 5.0/0.0 << endl; it will output nan!!!!!!!! cout << atan(5/0) causes RTE while atan(5.0/0.0) causes correct output!
